Text:
This is a better link for the screens:
http://www.imagebam.com/image/2c720e174266240

This is the extended version in which the 2 episodes are merged into one track. An .srt file is included, which should contain the English subtitles. In my case though, I was unable to play it with the video to confirm. The video quality is okay.. sometimes grainy and blurry. Anyway, was difficult to find the extended version of this movie and I'm happy that it downloaded very quickly.
